News.headline: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 13th February
News.page_title: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 13th February
News.URL_keywords: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 13th February
News.short_description: The Chigwell Construction Stadium will be hosting West Ham's U23 Premier League Cup fixture on Monday 13th February, when they face Nottingham Forest
News.description:
West Ham United’s under-23 side are back in action on Monday at the Chigwell Construction Stadium when they host Nottingham Forest at 7pm in another Premier League Cup game, after Thursday's 2-2 draw with Leicester City in the same competition.

The two sides met back in November in a Premier League Cup game at Alfreton Town, where the Hammers won 2-1 thanks to goals from Marcus Browne and Jahmal Hector-Ingram.

West Ham United U23 last Five Results:
Home v Leicester City D 2-2
Away v Blackburn L 2-1
Home v Aston Villa D 0-0
Away v Brighton L 0-3
Home v Norwich W 2-1

Admission to all Hammers U23 games at the Chigwell Construction Stadium is free for West Ham Season Ticket holders with admission costing everyone else £5 for adults and £3 for concessions. The Clubhouse is also open to all supporters before and after the game.
